title: User Account has been taken out
content:
By using BruteForce with random passwords, we have succedded the account
Impact
Account can be taken out
steps: Use a brute-force tool to generate and attempt random passwords against the target user account.
Observe successful login when the correct password is guessed, indicating account compromise.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves a brute-force attack on a user account, where an attacker systematically tries random passwords until the correct one is found, leading to unauthorized access.
reason: The attack is straightforward and does not involve multiple components, subtle interactions, complex application states, or novel logic. It relies on a well-known and commonly used method (brute-forcing) without any advanced techniques.
